sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import products from '../../data/products' import './style/productsTables.css' const rows = products.map(product => { const { id, name, price } = product const formatedPrice = (new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR', { style: 'currency', currency: 'BRL' }).format(price)) return ( {id + 1} {name} {`R$ ${formatedPrice}`} ) }) export default () => {rows}
Código Nome Preço
